evidence.claim: Utilizes AWS services to host and manage cloud infrastructure for their healthcare applications.
Implements FHIR and HL7 standards for healthcare data interoperability.
Employs X12 EDI for efficient billing and insurance transactions.
Integrates REST APIs to connect various healthcare systems for improved data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes X12 EDI standards for healthcare transactions and integrates with APIs.
